trans_title: 大猫，小世界 第一季
introduction: Three Big Cats occupy the top of the food chain, but they must compete for prey and territory in one of the wildest places in Africa.On the shores of Botswana's Gomoti River, Africa's three big cats have made themselves at home. Each has carved out a space to raise their young while trying to avoid the others. Witness how winter floods bring both opportunity and hardship, testing their survival abilities in Big Cats, Small World, a NATURE two-part miniseries.
chinese_title: 大猫，小世界 第一季
